com.atakmap.android.routes

Class RouteNavigationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.routes.RouteNavigationManager

  • public final class RouteNavigationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ROLE/RESPONSIBILITIES: -> Thread safe -> Owns RouteNavigatorEngine -> Manages Navigation State (Current Nav Point, Next Nav Point, etc.) -> Fires State Related Events -> Tracks ASSUMPTIONS: -> Only Navigating Forward -> Route CANNOT be Edited While Navigating
